ctu_text: The project proposals should be result-oriented with an eye on commercializing the product or process or service that would result from it. "}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": " The scheme is to provide financial assistance in the form of grants to Scientists and Technologists of R&D Centers/academic Institutions/Organizations actively involved in biotechnological research with emphasis on areas relating to marine, agriculture, health, and environment. The proposals need to be submitted with active collaboration with an industry in which the industrial partner is willing to share 25% of the KBC allocated funds additionally. "}]}]}], "benefitTypes": {"id": 1, "value": "cash", "label": "Cash"}, "benefits": [{"type": "align_justify", "children": [{"type": "ol_list", "children": [{"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "Financial assistance in the form of a grant of \u20b940 lakhs excluding overhead cost and industry share (25%) for a period of three years shall be provided to Scientists and Technologists of R&D Centers/academic Institutions/Organizations actively involved in biotechnological research with emphasis on areas relating to marine, agriculture, health and environment.
